revised_title: Preservation and Alterations of the Pantheon in Rome
tldr: The author discusses the recent alterations made to the Pantheon in Rome, including the cleaning and removal of the original silver work, and the proposed plans to replace the open circle at the top with a lanthorn. The article highlights the importance of preserving the original structure and the efforts of architect Giovanni Battista Piranesi to document and share the historical details of the building.
